Package backend.simboard

Class SimBoard

java.lang.Object
backend.simboard.SimBoard
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimBoardMono, SimBoardOcto, SimBoardQuad
public abstract class SimBoard
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • SimBoard

      public SimBoard​(Disease disease, java.awt.Rectangle dimens, int numPeople, double asymptomaticChance, int socialDistanceValue, double socialDistanceChance, int minAge, int maxAge, int minPreExistingConditions, int maxPreExistingConditions, double travelersPer)
      Creates a SimBoard to simulate the actions of people that are displayed on SimBoardPanel
      Parameters:
      disease - The disease object used for a simulation
      dimens - The rectangle that represents the area a person can move in
      numPeople - The total number of people in the simulation
      asymptomaticChance - The percent of people who are asymptomatic
      socialDistanceValue - The number of pixels each person tries to stay apart by when social distancing is enabled
      socialDistanceChance - The percent of people who participate in social distancing
      minAge - The minimum age of a person in the simulation
      maxAge - The maximum age of a person in the simulation
      minPreExistingConditions - The minimum pre-existing conditions of a person in the simulation
      maxPreExistingConditions - The maximum pre-existing conditions of a person in the simulation
      travelersPer - The percent of people who travel without bound in a quad or octo board

  • Method Details

    • constructDimensList

      public abstract void constructDimensList()
      Creates an ArrayList of rectangles that represent dimensions of different parts of the sim board

    • constructListPList

      public abstract void constructListPList()
      Creates an ArrayList of ArrayLists of people to be used when calling update methods

    • updateDimensList

      public abstract void updateDimensList​(java.awt.Rectangle updatedRect)
      Updates the dimensions of each rectangle each tick to keep each person in the correct zone
      Parameters:
      updatedRect - The current rectangle for the bounds of the SimBoardPanel

    • constructPListTotal

      public void constructPListTotal​(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Person>> ListPList, int startIndex)
      Helper method used in the constructListPList method
      Parameters:
      ListPList - The ArrayList of ArrayLists being constructed
      startIndex - The fist ArrayList of people to be added

    • constructPerson

      public Person constructPerson​(java.awt.Rectangle dimensQN, int quadLocation)
      Constructs the Person object (Helper method for the constructPList methods)
      Parameters:
      dimensQN - The rectangle object that represents the dimensions of the current person's range
      quadLocation - The "home" location of the person to return to after quarantine
      Returns:
      The newly constructed Person

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(java.awt.Graphics2D g2D)
      Updates the simboard by checking the distance from sick for each peron, updating each person list, checking quarantine and social distance and drawing the person objects on the SimBoardPanel
      Parameters:
      g2D - Grapgics object from SimBoardPanel used to draw the peron objects

    • updateDistanceFromSick

      public void updateDistanceFromSick()
      Calculates the minimum distance a healthy person is from a sick person

    • drawPList

      Helper method for the drawListPList method
      Parameters:
      pList - The current ArrayList of people being drawn
      dimensNum - The dimension of the people in the current ArrayList
      g2D - The graphics object being used to draw the people

    • toggleSocDist

      public void toggleSocDist​(boolean SocialDist)
      Switches between making each person (that is told to social distance) actively social distance and having freedom to move
      Parameters:
      SocialDist - Boolean value used to switch social distancing on and off
